item.title: About
item.description:
I am an architect (as in, buildings) turned software engineer. I’m currently working at AdSecure. I code in TypeScript, Golang, and Rust.

Email: hello@<this domain name>

Github: leonhfr

item.title: Hello, friend
item.description:
“Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person.

â€” Mr. Robot S01E01

This is the start of yet another developer blog. It’s been a long time coming as I have always wanted to have a blog but I have been postponing it.

Powered by Hugo with theme Anubis.

This blog uses Github features extensively:

  • Github Pages for hosting
  • Github Actions for deployment
  • Github issues for comments (via utteranc.es)
